description:
No. 1 App for file transfer on iPhone/iPad! Most secure file download/upload tool for business and professional users. 

Supported features include: 

1. Upload/download local files, photos/videos, or music files to FTP servers and iCloudDrive.  
2. Upload/download local files, photos/videos, or music files to SFTP/FTPS servers, network drives, DropBox, Box, SkyDrive, and GoogleDrive. (Upgrade required)
3. Support both user name/password and Private Key authentication.
4. Email local files, photos/videos, or music files. 
5. Manage files, including adding a folder, searching, renaming, moving or deleting files. 
6. View supported files, including: PDF, DOC, EXCEL, PPT, image files, MP3, TXT, video files, etc.
7. Open files using other Apps through “Open in”. 
8. Play photo slideshows. 
9. Playback music and videos. 
10. Support launching with a password. 
11. Print documents.
12. Share photos on Facebook, Twitter and Weibo. 
13. Allow Full Version users to upgrade to Pro Version features, including: Box, GoogleDrive, Skydrive access, and Network Drives.

With its simple interfaces, iTransfer provides the easiest way to transfer files on iPhone and iPad. 

If you have any questions, please visit: http://www.comcsoft.com/work/our_apps/iTransfer/iTransfer_overview.php.
trackCensoredName: iTransfer - File Upload / File Download Tool
trackName: iTransfer - File Upload / File Download Tool
releaseNotes:
1. Added iCloudDrive support.
2. Fixed an issue of accessing Photo Stream.
3. Fixed other UI bugs.
